sections.heading: Guard; officers; selection; separation
sections.text: The system of selecting and separating officers of the Nebraska National Guard will be prescribed in regulations issued by the Department of the Army or Department of the Air Force.SourceLaws 1917, c. 205, § 15, p. 488;Laws 1919, c. 121, § 3, p. 291;C.S.1922, §

55-138.National Guard; officers; selection; separation.

The system of selecting and separating officers of the Nebraska National Guard will be prescribed in regulations issued by the Department of the Army or Department of the Air Force.

SourceLaws 1917, c. 205, § 15, p. 488;Laws 1919, c. 121, § 3, p. 291;C.S.1922, § 3319;C.S.1929, § 55-139;R.S.1943, § 55-117;Laws 1953, c. 188, § 9, p. 596;R.R.S.1943, § 55-117;Laws 1969, c. 459, § 36, p. 1594;Laws 1978, LB 570, § 3.
